QuestData.Title: Final Report
QuestData.Description: <Gorat coughs deeply as he strains to speak.>$b$bIt was... an ambush....$b$bWe were... returning to the ramparts. All of us... lost....$b$bWe... discovered their leader... $b$b<Gorat painstakingly fills a vial with the blood spilling from one of his wounds.>$b$bMy men... must be avenged.... Bring this... to Kadrak....$b$bHe will know what to do....$b$b<Gorat expires.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Gorat wants you to return the Vial of Gorat's Blood to Kadrak at Mor'shan Ramparts.
QuestData.RewardText: <Kadrak listens intently as you share Gorat's last words.>$b$bIt is as I feared, then. May his rest be peaceful - only not yet!
